This ﬁnding is not too surprising. Given the seasonal structure of the data, we would expect
a function of the last few observations at prior points in the yearly cycle to be eﬀective.
11.7 Case Study 4: Trend and Seasonality
The monthly car sales dataset summarizes the monthly car sales in Quebec, Canada between
1960 and 1968. You can download the dataset directly from here:
